                     byte[] payload)

    • Method Detail

      • cancelAll

        public static void cancelAll()
        Cancel all RetryCallback instances. This can be used when a single callback wants to prevent all other callbacks from double-firing (in go-back-N).

      • getCallback

        public static RetryCallback getCallback(int seqNum)
        Get the callback associated with the passed sequence number.
        Parameters:
        seqNum - int The sequence corresponding to the callback to retrieve.
        Returns:
        RetryCallback The specified callback.

      • cancel

        public void cancel()
        Cancel this callback, without removing it from shared collection.

      • cancelAndRemove

        public void cancelAndRemove()
        Cancel this callback, and remove it from shared callback collection.

      • getPayload

        public byte[] getPayload()
        Get the payload associated with this callback
        Returns:
        byte[] The associated payload.

      • getTimeSent

        public long getTimeSent()
        Get the send-time associated with this callback
        Returns:
        long The associated send-time.

      • invoke

            throws java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                   java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException
